value:
Excuse me. Girl praying here.$k$p...Saint Elimine... Please make sure
everyone stays safe... And that they
all give me my fair share...

Just between us, I might look like your
usual cleric type, but you know what
I really am? A count's daughter!$k$pWhat?! I really am!

I will always be there when you
need me, whether you're injured in
battle or exhausted from duty.$k$pAnd I'll expect some token of thanks
from you—which is only fair, right?

I'm always on the lookout for a good
servant. Only qualified people,
you understand.$k$pI bet you'd be really good at it,
though!

If there's one thing I want in life, it's
for everyone to be healthy.$k$pBut also money and jewels. And great
food and fancy friends. Oh! And a
royal title befitting my station!

I'm Serra. Happy to see me?
Sure you are. I came ALL the way
here to see you, friend!
I'm just a natural!
Ha! Proof of my noble blood.

No, no, no! I can't believe that
just happened!

Wha—? You made me stronger?
Now I have to do more?!

I'm Serra—a sweet, helpless cleric.
So, now that we've got that settled,
don't push me too hard, OK?

By Saint Elimine, you certainly
have turned my life upside down
since you brought me here!$k$pGo here...battle there...heal this
person...then that person...$k$pWhy, don't you realize that I'm
pretty as a petal and TWICE
as fragile?$k$pBut I do need to offer my thanks.
I have developed a...thicker
skin, thanks to you.$k$pAnd by that, I mean that my skin
has actually gotten THICK,
being in such harsh conditions!$k$pStill, it's not entirely awful having
everyone dote on me, hoping
that I'll help them out.$k$pDon't worry. I'll always make time to
help you too—as long as you call me
Lady Serra at all times. Got it?
えいっ！
もうっ！
きゃああっ！
G-geesh!
Who, me? I'm helpless!
Bow down to me!
Very, VERY mean of you!
Take pity on little old me!
Drat!
Heehee
Adore me!
I'm here. Lucky you!
Did you bring me a little gift? Or a BIG one?
Oh, I'd never ask you to rub my shoulders. It's my FEET that are sore!
Battles have such a terrible cost. All that time in the sun? My skin is so dry!
I am a count's daughter. I really, really am!
You will protect little old me, won't you?
Yes?
On it!
Off I go!
